Výtečná hra, která na poli first person logic games nemá konkurenci. Po pas jí sahají jedině Talos Principle, Witness a předchozí Portal, které ovšem na celé čáře poráží příběhem, vtipem a skvělou kooperací pro dva hráče.

Serdecznie polecam zakup tej oto gry. W Portal 2 znajduje się tryb single player oraz multi player, tak zwany coop. W trybie dla jednego gracza znajduje się fabuła, która wielokrotnie zaskakuje przebiegiem akcji. W trybie współpracy można grać z ludźmi z całego świata poprzez opcję wybrania losowego kompana. Jak pewnie już wiecie, w tryb coop najlepiej gra się ze znajomym. Jeszcze raz bardzo polecam tą grę i życzę powodzenia w przyszłym przechodzeniu poziomów.
Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei, um jogo muito divertido e engraçado de se jogar com um amigo, recomendo muito esse jogo
Polecam cieplutko
Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, su campaña es una de las mejores

De los juegos más revolucionarios de su época. Marco un antes y un después en lo que a juegos de puzzles se refiere. Sin duda uno de esos juegos a los que pasados unos años, vuelves a jugar y a disfrutar de la experiencia.
Bestes Spiel ever <3

[h1]So good, I named my cat Wheatley.[/h1]

What is there even left to say about this game that hasn't already been said? The story, the voice acting, the gameplay, the visual and sound design, the characters... it's all gold. For me to even gush about all that, as well as the outrageously fun co-op (thanks again for the great time, Fin) would just be redundant. Don't take my or anyone else's word for it; just let the 98% positive rating speak for itself. Play it for yourself, play it with a friend, and understand why this game is so revered.

[spoiler]My nominee for the 2018 Steam Awards "Better with Friends" award.[/spoiler]

Gran juego!
Lo tenía hace tiempo y hace poco un amigo me recomendó que lo jugara y me alegro mucho de haber seguido su recomendación.
Pese a los años que tiene el aspecto gráfico es muy bueno. La jugabilidad es espectacular y el guión que enlaza los puzzles es gracioso.
Curiosamente tuve unos problemas con la conexión a Internet y me marca pocas horas de juego.
Mesmo sendo um jogo "antigo", ainda nos oferece horas de desafios com os mapas da oficina e uma otima historia com a campanha coop e principal
Очень классная игра жду продолжения

Even though it's pretty old it's still amongst the best story games on the market. It has a unique and enjoyable concept, though the storyline can sometime feel a bit predictable. 

I had no problem at all whilst playing it, it's really well optimised and the graphics is looking quite good.

I really enjoy playing it and I highly recommend it to anyone who's thinking of buying it.

Are you ready for testing? No? Oh well then you are in huge trouble! But don't worry, you won't be hurt. Ok.. atleast you won't die, GLaDOS i here, and she won't let you die until you don't finish all of the tests :d 
Great game to play solo, but also to have fun with friends in coop mode. And if you think that you need more more testnig, there is thousands of community chambers to play. It's testing heaven with endless possibilities.

Let's say you are in a cubic room 10mts high and 5 mts wide. There are a couple of gates on each wall but they are too small for you, any escape through them is impossible.

While you're standing on the ground, you can hear the little gates opening. A bunch of sentry turrets from the other side aim their laser scopes at you, with the only intention to turn you into a shapeless bunch of flesh and bones.

You have 3 seconds to escape.

Now you're thinking with portals.
Игра всех времён! В неё не грех и сейчас зайти!

"Do you know the biggest lesson I learned from what you did? I discovered I have a sort of black-box quick-save feature. In the event of a catastrophic failure, the last two minutes of my life are preserved for analysis. I was able – well, forced, really – to relive you killing me. Again and again. Forever. You know, if you had done that to someone else, they might devote their existence to exacting … revenge."
